thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Worth every pound! Modern, clean and amazing staff.
thread.title_full: Worth every pound! Modern, clean and amazing staff. - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Adriana M
title: Worth every pound! Modern, clean and amazing staff.
text:
The room - Amazing! Very modern, clean and homey. The staff was awesome, super helpful and made sure we were as comfortable as we can be.
Very close to Victoria Station, 5 minute walk max.
And did I mention the room was amazing.
It is small, but so comfortable and seductive that the size gave an intimate feeling. I slept like a baby and definitely made me want to stay longer in London!
